about_the_game:
Bash Sports Online Bowling 2024 is the ultimate bowling experience, combining classic bowling fun with a thrilling arcade twist. Dive into a world where you can compete against friends or players worldwide, whether on PC or in the arcade. With vibrant graphics, engaging gameplay, and a host of unique characters and alleys, this game promises endless entertainment for bowling enthusiasts and casual gamers alike.

Key Features:

Nine Unique Characters: Choose from a diverse cast of nine characters, each with their own special abilities and personalities. Whether you prefer power, precision, or quirky tricks, there's a character for you.
Multiple Alleys: Bowl in various stunning alleys, each with its own theme and challenges. From classic lanes to futuristic settings, every alley offers a new experience.
Multiplayer Modes: Enjoy seamless multiplayer action with friends or players around the globe. Engage in friendly matches or climb the competitive ranks in ranked matches.
Arcade vs. PC Crossplay: Experience true cross-platform play, allowing you to compete with players on both arcade machines and PCs. Never miss a match, no matter where you are.
Unlockables: Earn rewards and unlock new content as you progress. Customize your characters, upgrade your equipment, and discover new alleys and challenges.
Special Abilities: Some characters come equipped with rockets to power up their shots, while others can defend with walls, adding a strategic layer to the traditional game of bowling.
Ranked Matches: Prove your skills and climb the leaderboards in intense ranked matches. Compete against the best and earn your place as a top bowler.
Engaging Graphics and Sound: Enjoy vibrant, high-quality graphics and immersive sound effects that bring the alleys and characters to life.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 @ 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GTS 512
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-Bit Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K @ 3.50GHz or AMD FX-9370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R7 370
